# Hey üëãüèª I'm Kadmiel!

### ü§ñ AI/Automation Specialist | üìä IT Project Manager

Welcome! I'm a Project Manager with a journey from Environmental Engineering and Bioinformatics to AI-powered process automation. I specialize in using GenAI and low-code platforms to turn complex business challenges into elegant, automated processes. I strongly believe that solutions are meant to be practical, efficient, and always focused on empowering people.

## üöÄ Professional Impact & Achievements

- **GenAI Implementation**: Led global Focus Group Discussions to improve GenAI tools, championing AI adoption across teams
- **Process Automation**: Engineered business process automation using JavaScript, Python, and low-code platforms integrated with GenAI
- **Cross-functional Leadership**: Fostered stakeholder relationships and drove alignment on priorities across Product, Engineering, and Tech teams
- **Data-Driven Insights**: Delivered actionable insights through statistical analysis, SQL, and data visualization (Metabase)
- **Product Development**: Collaborated on optimizing user-facing tools and conducted User Acceptance Testing for global roll-outs
- **Subject Matter Expert**: Provided consultation and mentorship on Payment and Technical SOPs, knowledge-sharing best practices

## üí° Next Steps & Interests

- ü§ñ Exploring advanced AI applications: Multi-agent systems, RAG, LLM fine-tuning
- üë®üèª‚Äçüíª Keep pushing the limits of Vibe Coding
- üîß Expanding automation capabilities with n8n and custom integrations
